description: A FULLY FURNISHED 1st floor (LIFT) studio apartment located in this popular block. Large lounge/bedroom with two large storage cupboards/wardrobes. Kitchen/diner with electric oven/hob, washing machine, and fridge. Modern bathroom with electric shower, WC, and basin. Double glazing. RENT INCLUDES SEASONAL HEATING & CONSTANT HOT WATER. Residents' permit parking. FULLY MANAGED. AVAILABLE 12/07/2021.
facilities: Bournemouth Station 0.5 miles, convenience store nearby

description: Ground Floor Studio Flat close to Westbourne. Studio room, with built in open wardrobe with kitchen which includes fridge/freezer and washing machine. Separate shower room. Gas central heating, double glazing and allocated parking space for one car. EPC Rating: C Available June 2021. Property comes Unfurnished. EPC rating: C.
facilities: Branksome Station 0.8 miles, also close to supermarket and park

description: A five double bedroom house located in the very heart of Winton and within close proximity to Bournemouth University. The property is presented in very good condition and is furnished to a good standard. Large fitted kitchen with a comprehensive range of white goods. Upvc double glazing, gas central heating and a large rear garden.
